title: Limiting Factor for The Growth EV's is The Grid Says SparkCharge CEO
description: Josh Aviv, Founder and CEO of SparkCharge, joins Bloomberg Businessweek Daily to discuss the demand for electric vehicles and the state of America’s electric vehicle charging infrastructure buildout. As well as his thoughts on the recent news from the Environmental Protection Agency and how they are ending the federal government’s push to get auto manufacturers to install a start-stop feature in vehicles. (Source: Bloomberg)
